title: APOTHECARY TINCTURA
description: Denver Herbal Apothecary featuring organic herbs, tinctures, teas, essential oils and unique gifts. Offering classes and wellness treatments
cleaned_text: WELCOME APOTHECARY TINCTURA Plant Spirit Medicine photo credit: www.lauracookstyle.com www.jesusaguilarphoto.com photo credit: www.lauracookstyle.com www.jesusaguilarphoto.com Our dynamic group of practitioners offer integrated wellness services to make healing happen for you. We don't treat symptoms, but instead focus on the foundations of your health: mind, body & spirit! It's all about facilitating the safe space for you to explore, grow, reclaim, and remember your most centered self. We have a little something for everyone in our unique workshops. Our goal is to provide you with an experience that inspires your passion for natural healing and plant medicine, enhances your sense of community and encourages your desire to integrate wellness into your life. Explore what the world of herbal medicine, essential oils, earth-based wisdom, and traditional healing wisdom has to offer you. In addition to our classes & workshops, we offer sales, celebrations, open-houses, and community events that give you an open door to try something new, empower yourself, and have fun while you're doing it. Organic bulk herbs Essential oils & aromatherapy Teas Tinctures Natural skin care Books, and Unique gifts for the body, mind & spirit We are the only apothecary in Denver to offer a comprehensive line of medicinal herbal tinctures hand-crafted in small batches at our lab and offered to you in our storefront. We welcome you to our sacred healing space. Many of you have wondered what happens behind the store wall; we like to think it is a little bit of real world healing magic. No hocus pocus, just heart-centered presence. We are here to listen to your needs and support you on your journey. Whatever your health goals may be, we are with you all the way. "This is what rituals are for. We do spiritual ceremonies as human beings in order to create a safe resting place for our most complicated feelings of joy or trauma, so that we don't have to haul those feelings around with us forever, weighing us down. We all need such places of ritual safekeeping. And I do believe that if your culture or tradition doesn't have the specific ritual you are craving, then you are absolutely permitted to make up a ceremony of your own devising, fixing your own broken-down emotional systems with all the do-it-yourself resourcefulness of a generous plumber/poet." [Elizabeth Gilbert](http://www.goodreads.com/author/show/11679.Elizabeth_Gilbert), [Eat, Pray, Love](http://www.goodreads.com/work/quotes/3352398) Nature is your cure, not because it fixes, but because it teaches. Everything you need to heal can be found in the wisdom of nature.
